name: Autumn
review_text: I'm so thankful for TWK9! My sweet dog Autumn was always so shy and unsure of herself, but after her Board and Train, she's like a whole new girl confident, happy, and proud of herself. They were so patient and gentle with her, and I could tell she was cared for every step of the way. I'm beyond grateful for the love and confidence they helped her find!

name: Liberty
review_text: I can't say enough good things about Tanner at TWK9! My dog used to be reactive and aggressive toward other dogs. Walks were a nightmare, and I honestly thought I'd have to rehome him. After just a few weeks with Tanner, he came back calmer, confident, and totally changed. Tanner took the time to understand why my dog was acting out and built a plan that worked. Now we can walk past other dogs with zero issues. It's like night and day, worth every penny!

name: Dracaryus
review_text: My girl Dracaryus used to react to every dog we passed, but after a 2-week Board and Train with TWK9, she's completely different. She's calm, focused, and I can take her places without stress. Huge difference totally worth it.

name: Remi
review_text: Tanner is an awesome dog trainer! My dog Remi is a rescue and is afraid of his own shadow. He was terrified of men especially. Tanner was gentle and engaged with him in a fun way to help get him out of his shell. He really helped Remi become more confident and fulfilled.
